Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.32252021]Ebola Virus(EBOV):inhibition of viral infection in Hela cells(IC50=0.71 µM);inhibition of viral infection in primary macrophages(IC50=5.6 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Act as CatB inhibitors to block the endosomal processing of EBOV GP, thus preventing virus entry.

Literature.Title: Engineered Human Cathelicidin Antimicrobial Peptides Inhibit Ebola Virus Infection.
Literature.Author: Yu Y, Cooper CL, Wang G, Morwitzer MJ, Kota K, Tran JP, Bradfute SB, Liu Y, Shao J, Zhang AK, Luo LG, Reid SP, Hinrichs SH, Su K.

Literature.Author: Wang X, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, narayana JL, Wang G

Literature.Title: Arginine-lysine positional swap of the LL-37 peptides reveals evolutional advantages of the native sequence and leads to bacterial probes
